name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Selfish of a Rough Stone【#星街すいせい４周年LIVE 】 [RDHf9Tmdvpk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: MC section after the song, greeting the audience and discussing the performance.

subtitles.original:
Ready Steady
作詞：q*Left / 作曲：Giga
subtitles.english:
Ready Steady
Lyrics: q*Left / Composition: Giga

subtitles.original: 凡そ邪魔　物足りなさは消えちゃったし
subtitles.english: Mostly a nuisance, the feeling of lack has vanished

subtitles.original: あり余って笑っちゃうくらい
subtitles.english: To the point where I'm laughing because there's so much

subtitles.original: 獲物はないなんて言ったってしょうがないし
subtitles.english: It's no use saying there's no prey

subtitles.original: お手上げでハイファイブ
subtitles.english: Hands up for a high five

subtitles.original: 燃えりゃええ　後に続いたってつまんねえ
subtitles.english: Just burn it up, it's boring to follow behind

subtitles.original: 夢を語れ　俺がこの街のスタンダーダー
subtitles.english: Talk about your dreams, I'm the standard-setter in this city

subtitles.original: まだ見たい退屈だけなんてNO 嘘です
subtitles.english: I still want to see, just boredom is a NO, I'm lying

subtitles.original: そろそろマイク頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me the mic soon

subtitles.original: さよなら　もう後戻りもできないくらい
subtitles.english: Goodbye, so far that I can't turn back

subtitles.original: 遠くに隠させてもらう
subtitles.english: I'll hide away far away

subtitles.original: まだまだ嵌まっていきたい　なんかまるで恋してるみたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep falling for it, it feels just like being in love

subtitles.original: 好きになっちゃった　うっせぇな
subtitles.english: I've fallen for you, shut up

subtitles.original: ならこのまま　君を連れて望むなら
subtitles.english: Then just like this, if you want me to take you along

subtitles.original: どこまでも演じたいわ
subtitles.english: I want to play the part forever

subtitles.original: 欲しがってばかりで結構結構
subtitles.english: Just wanting more and more is fine, fine

subtitles.original: もし叶うなら　この先の未来を知りたい
subtitles.english: If it comes true, I want to know the future ahead

subtitles.original: 行きたい
subtitles.english: I want to go

subtitles.original: Ready Steady
subtitles.english: Ready Steady

subtitles.original: ほんのちょっとだけなら　無茶だってしちゃいたいし
subtitles.english: If it's just a little bit, I want to do something reckless

subtitles.original: この世のすべてで笑っちゃうくらい
subtitles.english: To the point of laughing at everything in this world

subtitles.original: とはいえがったって馬鹿じゃどうしようもないし
subtitles.english: Even so, if you're a fool who complains, there's no helping it

subtitles.original: 媚び跳ねてハイファイブ
subtitles.english: Spurning flattery for a high five

subtitles.original: ねえ少しはこっち向いたらどう？
subtitles.english: Hey, why don't you look this way for a bit?

subtitles.original: 今更嵌まらしたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to get you hooked now

subtitles.original: 誰もが羨む今宵トラックとリリックで
subtitles.english: With tonight's tracks and lyrics that everyone envies

subtitles.original: 見せていくからリテイクはしないで
subtitles.english: I'll show you, so please don't retake

subtitles.original: ならこのまま　君を連れて望むなら
subtitles.english: Then just like this, if you want me to take you along

subtitles.original: どこまでも演じたいわ
subtitles.english: I want to play the part forever

subtitles.original: ないものねだりなら結構結構
subtitles.english: If it's asking for the impossible, that's fine, fine

subtitles.original: はやく宵明けって　朝焼けに誓う
subtitles.english: Swear to the sunrise that the dawn will come soon

subtitles.original: 煽れ煽れ熱の叫べ
subtitles.english: Stir it up, stir it up, scream with heat

subtitles.original: この声をきいて尊ぶ音に
subtitles.english: Hear this voice, in the sound I revere

subtitles.original: 音に狂え
subtitles.english: Go crazy for the sound

subtitles.original: I want more
subtitles.english: I want more

subtitles.original: Are you Ready?
subtitles.english: Are you Ready?

subtitles.original: "Are you Ready?"
subtitles.english: "Are you Ready?"

subtitles.original: どこまでも演じたいわ
subtitles.english: I want to play the part forever

subtitles.original: 欲しがってばかりで結構結構
subtitles.english: Just wanting more and more is fine, fine

subtitles.original: もし叶うなら　この先の未来を知りたい
subtitles.english: If it comes true, I want to know the future ahead

subtitles.original: 行きたい
subtitles.english: I want to go

subtitles.original: Ready Steady
subtitles.english: Ready Steady

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: ハローハロー！
subtitles.english: Hello hello!

subtitles.original: ハロー、エブリワン！
subtitles.english: Hello, everyone!

subtitles.original: ハロー、エブリワン！楽しんでるー！？
subtitles.english: Hello, everyone! Are you having fun!?

subtitles.original: やったー！すごーい！カリオペ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Amazing! Calliope!

subtitles.original: 本当に嬉しい！嬉しいです、よかった！
subtitles.english: I'm really happy! I'm happy, I'm glad!

subtitles.original: やったー、嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Yay, I'm happy!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！3D！
subtitles.english: Congratulations on the 3D!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: こちらこそ！なんか、えっと、
subtitles.english: Same here! Well, um,

subtitles.original: 4周年記念と誕生日すごいおめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Congratulations on your 4th anniversary and birthday!

subtitles.original: やったー！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you!

subtitles.original: めっちゃめっちゃワクワクしてる、本当にね。
subtitles.english: I'm really, really excited, honestly.

subtitles.original: ワクワクワクワクしてる。やったー！
subtitles.english: I'm so excited. Yay!

subtitles.original: おカリオペの動きが、もうなんか、パワフル、本当に。
subtitles.english: Calliope's movements are just so powerful, really.

subtitles.original: そうね。
subtitles.english: Right.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！すごい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Amazing!

subtitles.original: え、あの、Twitterのナンバー2トレンド！
subtitles.english: Uh, um, number 2 trending on Twitter!

subtitles.original: ナンバー2トレンド！すごい！
subtitles.english: Number 2 trending! Amazing!

subtitles.original: やったー！めっちゃありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: なんか今日、カリオペを呼びたいと思って、お呼びさせていただきまして。
subtitles.english: I wanted to invite Calliope today, so I did.

subtitles.original: もうね、過密なスケジュールの中来ていただきまして、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming despite your packed schedule.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: なんか、すごい光栄です。
subtitles.english: I'm so honored.

subtitles.original: ずっと一緒に3Dで歌いたかったから、めっちゃ嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: I've always wanted to sing in 3D together, so I'm very happy.

subtitles.original: 私も嬉しい！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: I'm happy too! Yay!
